page.description: Undo a set of changes started with BeginTransaction, but not yet applied (CommitTransaction hasn't been called).
page.original:
SQL::Connection::RollBackTransaction() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .RollBackTransaction() ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object.
Description The RollBackTransaction() method undoes a set of changes started with BeginTransaction(), but not yet applied with CommitTransaction(). Limitations Example Refer to SQL::Connection::BeginTransaction(). See Also SQL::Connection Object
